resolveDescription: Resolves the suggestions from this server
resolveAcceptDescription: Marks a suggestion from this server as accepted
resolveConsiderDescription: Marks a suggestion from this server as considered
resolveDenyDescription: Marks a suggestion from this server as denied
resolveOptionsResponseDescription: The response to be added to the suggestion message
resolveNotConfigured: This server does not have a suggestions channel configured, please configure it with `/config edit channel #channel` or ask an administrator to do it.
resolveSuggestionArchived: The suggestion is archived and cannot be edited.
resolveSuggestionIdDoesNotExist: The suggestion ID you specified does not exist.
resolveSuggestionMessageDeleted: The suggestion's message has been deleted, and therefore, it has been automatically archived.
resolveFailure: I wasn't able to update the suggestion {{id}}, sorry!
suggestDescription: Create a new suggestion for this server
suggestModifyArchived: You cannot modify a suggestion that is archived. You may reference it with a new suggestion.
suggestModifyDoesNotExist: The suggestion you specified does not exist.
suggestModifyMessageDeleted: It seems the suggestion you are trying to edit was deleted, and as such, automatically archived. Sorry!
suggestModifyMismatchingAuthor: You cannot modify somebody else's suggestion.
suggestModifyNotConfigured: This server has removed the suggestions channel from the configuration, and as such, all suggestions are now read-only. Please contact the server's administrators about this incident if this was supposed to work.
suggestModifyReplied: You cannot modify a suggestion that was replied. You may follow it up in the discussion channel.
suggestNewNotConfigured: This server has not configured the suggestions channel yet. Please contact the administrators to set it up!
